EmailTemplate.subject: Travel Farther, Faster, Safer with DU-875 Displays from Honeywell and Western Aircraft.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.westair.com/]]>
Honeywell and its business partner, Western Aircraft, offer the owners of Falcon 900EX/900C and Embraer Legacy 600/650 the opportunity to transform the performance, safety and value of your aircraft with cabin updates.
Tired of seeing flight information on a 25-year CRT screen? Frustrated by failures and exchange costs? Improve your pilot’s vision and add instant value to your aircraft with the update of the Honeywell DU-875 displays. Unlike many other screens, the DU-875 LCD display units are designed to fit your existing system, reducing downtime and additional costs. The best part? The DU-875 update doesn’t require additional pilot training or cabin modifications. Update your screen today and get some of the latest security features that come with the DU-875* program:
- 3D terrain, obstacles and runway data
- Traffic alert and collision avoidance system
- Meteorological Terminal Aviation Routine Weather Reports (METARs) and Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts (TAFs)
Contact Western Aircraft today for more information and save on your new or existing HAPP plan – Honeywell Avionic Protection Plan.
UPDATE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/WesternAircraft_DU-875.html]]>
*Some features are available only on select platforms.
